rAuq here, making an announcement regarding moderators and polling.

     First thing,

For the moment, polling will be slightly more restricted. This is 
what has changed:

--- Mmembers can vote in polls; Moderators can create/modify/vote in 
polls.

If you want a poll to be made, simply email the question and the 
possible choices to me (x_rauq_x@...) or to one of the other 
moderators.

We decided to restrict polling due to the recent number of 
inflammatory polls. So those who wish to create a poll must first 
submit it to the council for editing.

     Second thing,

Hugar has been far too incactive for the past while (just about 2 
months actually) so he has lost his moderator abilities. To replace 
Hugar, Azure now officially a moderator. We chose not to have a vote 
to decide this because there aren't really enough people to vote 
accurately, thus making a moderator based decision perferable. In 
simpler terms, listen to what Azure says, and we'll all get along 
fine. =P

Questions or further comments can be emailed to me.
